imageCropper.placeholder: Select an image to start cropping

imageResizer.description: Resize images by pixels or percentage with preset sizes

imageCompressor.name: Image Compressor
imageCompressor.description: Compress images to reduce file size while maintaining quality

imageConverter.description: Convert images between PNG, JPEG, WebP, GIF, and BMP formats

imageRotator.name: Image Rotator
imageRotator.description: Rotate images by any angle with precise control

imageFilter.name: Image Filter
imageFilter.description: Apply filters like brightness, contrast, saturation, and more
imageFilter.placeholder: Select an image to apply filters

imageWatermark.name: Image Watermark
imageWatermark.description: Add text watermarks to images with customizable position and style
imageWatermark.placeholder: Select an image to add watermark

imageColorPicker.name: Image Color Picker
imageColorPicker.description: Pick colors from images and get HEX, RGB, and HSL values
imageColorPicker.hoverHint: Move cursor over image to see colors
imageColorPicker.placeholder: Select an image to pick colors

imageMetadata.name: Image Metadata Viewer
imageMetadata.description: View image metadata including dimensions, file size, and format
imageMetadata.selectHint: Select an image to view metadata
imageMetadata.placeholder: Select an image to view metadata

screenshotTool.name: Screenshot Tool
screenshotTool.description: Capture HTML content or images as screenshots with format options
screenshotTool.placeholder: Enter HTML or select an image
screenshotTool.tip1: Use higher scale for sharper images

imageCollage.name: Image Collage Maker
imageCollage.description: Combine multiple images into a collage with various layouts

bgRemover.name: Image Background Remover
bgRemover.description: Remove background colors from images with tolerance control
bgRemover.successHint: Download the PNG to preserve transparency
bgRemover.tip1: Works best with solid color backgrounds
bgRemover.placeholder: Select an image to remove background

imageAnnotator.name: Image Annotator
imageAnnotator.description: Add annotations like arrows, shapes, and text to images
imageAnnotator.tip1: Click and drag to draw shapes
imageAnnotator.tip3: Use undo to remove last annotation

imageBlur.name: Image Blur Tool
imageBlur.description: Apply blur effect to entire image or specific regions
imageBlur.regionHint: Click and drag on the image to select region to blur
imageBlur.tip1: Use region blur to hide sensitive info
imageBlur.tip2: Higher blur values create stronger effect
imageBlur.tip3: Drag to redefine the blur region
imageBlur.placeholder: Select an image to apply blur

imageMosaic.name: Image Mosaic Tool
imageMosaic.description: Apply pixelation mosaic effect to hide sensitive areas
imageMosaic.regionHint: Click and drag on the image to select region to pixelate
imageMosaic.tip1: Use mosaic to censor sensitive content
imageMosaic.tip2: Larger pixel size hides more detail
imageMosaic.tip3: Drag to redefine the mosaic region
imageMosaic.placeholder: Select an image to apply mosaic

caseConverter.name: Case Converter
caseConverter.description: Convert text case: UPPERCASE, lowercase, Capitalize, Sentence case, aLtErNaTiNg, and more

textCounter.name: Text Counter
textCounter.description: Count characters, words, sentences, paragraphs, lines, and estimate reading/speaking time

textDiff.name: Text Diff
textDiff.description: Compare two texts and highlight the differences with additions, deletions, and changes

duplicateRemover.name: Duplicate Remover
duplicateRemover.description: Remove duplicate lines or words with options for case sensitivity and keeping first/last occurrence

textSorter.name: Text Sorter
textSorter.description: Sort text lines alphabetically, numerically, by length, or randomly with ascending/descending options
textSorter.inputPlaceholder: Enter text to sort (one item per line)...
